thread.title: Federal Cybersecurity Second Only to Finance Industry, New Report Says
thread.title_full: Federal Cybersecurity Second Only to Finance Industry, New Report Says

title: Federal Cybersecurity Second Only to Finance Industry, New Report Says
text:
23 Federal Cybersecurity Second Only to Finance Industry, New Report Says 
Nextgov: Relative to other industries, the federal government is pretty well protected against cyberattacks, a new report claims. Out of six industries, finance is most prepared to fend off cyberthreats, but the federal government isn't far behind, according to Cambridge, Massachusetts-based security assessment firm BitSight Technologies.
